description.english: Finish the first trial by reducing the power of suspicion to 0
description.german: Erste Prüfung durch Senken des Argwohns auf 0 bestehen
description.french: Finir la première épreuve en réduisant le degré de méfiance à 0
description.italian: Finisci la prima prova riducendo il sospetto a 0
description.schinese: 通过将猜忌的程度降低到0来完成第一次试炼
description.russian: Завершите первое испытание, снизив Силу сомнения до 0
description.turkish: İlk sınavı kuşku gücünü sıfıra indirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o primeiro desafio reduzindo o nível de suspeita dos guardiões de tradições antigas até 0.

description.english: Finish the first trial by subjugating the keepers of the ancient traditions
description.german: Erste Prüfung durch Unterwerfung der Hüter alter Traditionen bestehen
description.french: Finir la première épreuve en soumettant les gardiens des anciennes coutumes
description.italian: Finisci la prima prova soggiogando i guardiani delle antiche tradizioni
description.schinese: 通过征服古老传统的守护者来完成第一次试炼
description.russian: Завершите первое испытание подчинением племени хранителей старых порядков
description.turkish: İlk sınavı eski geleneklerin koruyucularına boyun eğdirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o primeiro desafio subjugando a tribo dos guardiões de tradições antigas.

description.english: Finish the first trial after choosing 'Hell on earth' prologue without recruiting workers
description.german: Erste Prüfung nach Auswahl der Prologoption 'Hölle auf Erden' bestehen, ohne Arbeiter zu erschaffen
description.french: Finir la première épreuve avec le prologue 'Enfer sur terre' et sans recruter de travailleurs
description.italian: Finisci la prima prova dopo aver scelto il prologo 'Inferno sulla terra' senza reclutare lavoratori
description.schinese: 在序章选择“人间地狱”且没有招募工人的情况下完成第一次试炼
description.russian: Завершите первое испытание с прологом 'Ад на земле', не наняв ни одного рабочего
description.turkish: İlk sınavı girişte
description.brazilian: Complete o primeiro desafio depois de escolher 'Inferno vivente' no Prólogo sem recrutar trabalhadores.

description.english: Finish the second trial by subjugating regions one by one
description.german: Zweite Prüfung durch Unterwerfung der Regionen nacheinander bestehen
description.french: Finir la deuxième épreuve en soumettant les régions une par une
description.italian: Finisci la seconda prova soggiogando le regioni una ad una
description.schinese: 通过逐个征服地区来完成第二次试炼
description.russian: Завершите второе испытание, подчинив регионы один за другим
description.turkish: İkinci sınavı bölgelere tek tek boyun eğdirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o segundo desafio subjugando as regiões uma por uma.

description.english: Finish the second trial by making all the regions surrender
description.german: Zweite Prüfung durch Kapitulation aller Regionen bestehen
description.french: Finir la deuxième épreuve en poussant toutes les régions à la reddition
description.italian: Finisci la seconda prova facendo arrendere tutte le regioni
description.schinese: 通过让所有地区投降来完成第二次试炼
description.russian: Завершите второе испытание, заставив все регионы сдаться.
description.turkish: İkinci sınavı tüm bölgelerin teslim olmasını sağlayarak tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o segundo desafio fazendo com que todas as regiões se rendam de uma só vez.

description.english: Finish the second trial in 2 turns
description.german: Zweite Prüfung in 2 Runden bestehen
description.french: Finir la deuxième épreuve en 2 tours
description.italian: Finisci la seconda prova in 2 turni
description.schinese: 在两个回合之内完成第二次试炼
description.russian: Завершите второе испытание за 2 хода
description.turkish: İkinci sınavı iki tur içinde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o segundo desafio em 2 turnos.

description.english: Finish the third trial by defeating Narmer in a decisive battle
description.german: Dritte Prüfung durch Sieg über Narmer in entscheidender Schlacht bestehen
description.french: Finir la troisième épreuve en vainquant Narmer à l'issue d'une bataille décisive
description.italian: Finisci la terza prova sconfiggendo Narmer in una battaglia decisiva
description.schinese: 在一场决战中击败那尔迈完成第三次试炼
description.russian: Завершите третье испытание, победив Нармера в решающем сражении
description.turkish: Üçüncü sınavı Narmer'i kesin savaşta yenerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o terceiro desafio derrotando Narmer em combate direto.

description.english: Finish the third trial by ambushing Narmer
description.german: Dritte Prüfung durch Überfall auf Narmer aus dem Hinterhalt bestehen
description.french: Finir la troisième épreuve en tendant une embuscade à Narmer
description.italian: Finisci la terza prova facendo un'imboscata a Narmer
description.schinese: 通过伏击那尔迈完成第三次试炼
description.russian: Завершите третье испытание, победив Нармера атакой из засады
description.turkish: Üçüncü sınavı Narmer'i pusuya düşürerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o terceiro desafio derrotando Narmer em uma emboscada.

description.english: Finish the third trial by ambushing Narmer without bribes or fortifications
description.german: Dritte Prüfung durch Überfall auf Narmer aus dem Hinterhalt bestehen, ohne Bestechung oder Festungen zu nutzen
description.french: Finir la troisième épreuve en tendant une embuscade à Narmer sans corruption ni remparts
description.italian: Finisci la terza prova facendo un imboscata a Narmer senza corruzione o fortificazioni
description.schinese: 在没有收买或防御工事的情况下埋伏那尔迈完成第三次试炼
description.russian: Завершите третье испытание, победив Нармера атакой из засады, не применяя подкуп и укрепление
description.turkish: Üçüncü sınavı rüşvet vermeden ya da savunma yapısı kurmadan Narmer'i pusuya düşürerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o terceiro desafio derrotando Narmer em uma emboscada sem o uso de fortificações ou subornos.

description.english: Finish the fourth trial in any way
description.german: Vierte Prüfung beliebig bestehen
description.french: Finir la quatrième épreuve d'une manière ou d'une autre
description.italian: Finisci la quarta prova in qualsiasi maniera
description.schinese: 以任意方式完成第四次试炼
description.russian: Завершите четвертое испытание любым способом
description.turkish: Dördüncü sınavı herhangi bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quarto desafio de uma maneira ou outra.

description.english: Finish the fourth trial only using sacrifices
description.german: Vierte Prüfung nur mit Opferdarbringung bestehen
description.french: Finir la quatrième épreuve juste par des sacrifices
description.italian: Finisci la quarta prova usando solo sacrifici
description.schinese: 仅使用献祭来完成第四次试炼
description.russian: Завершите четвертое испытание только с помощью жертв
description.turkish: Dördüncü sınavı yalnızca kurban vererek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quarto desafio usando apenas sacrifícios.

description.english: Finish the fourth trial in 1 turn
description.german: Vierte Prüfung in 1 Runde bestehen
description.french: Finir la quatrième épreuve en 1 tour
description.italian: Finisci la quarta prova in 1 turno
description.schinese: 在一个回合内完成第四次试炼
description.russian: Завершите четвертое испытание за 1 ход
description.turkish: Dördüncü sınavı tek tur içinde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quarto desafio em um turno.

description.english: Prevent the fifth trial by curbing the growth of separatism
description.german: Fünfte Prüfung durch Unterbindung von Separatismus verhindern
description.french: Empêcher la cinquième épreuve en endiguant la croissance du séparatisme
description.italian: Impedisci la quinta prova fermando la crescita del separatismo
description.schinese: 通过遏制分裂势力的增长来避免第五次试炼
description.russian: Остановите появление пятого испытания на этапе 'Рост сепаратизма'
description.turkish: Beşinci sınavı ayrılıkçılıktaki artışı durdurarak tamamla.
description.brazilian: Evite o aparecimento do quinto desafio bloqueando a surgimento do separatismo.

description.english: Finish the fifth trial in any way
description.german: Fünfte Prüfung beliebig bestehen
description.french: Finir la cinquième épreuve d'une manière ou d'une autre
description.italian: Finisci la quinta prova in qualsiasi maniera
description.schinese: 以任意方式完成第五次试炼
description.russian: Завершите пятое испытание любым способом
description.turkish: Beşinci sınavı herhangi bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quinto desafio de uma maneira ou outra.

description.english: Finish the fifth trial only using combat
description.german: Fünfte Prüfung nur mit Einsatz des Militärs bestehen
description.french: Finir la cinquième épreuve juste en combattant
description.italian: Finisci la quinta prova solamente combattendo
description.schinese: 仅使用战斗来完成第五次试炼
description.russian: Завершите пятое испытание только с помощью сражений
description.turkish: Beşinci sınavı yalnızca şiddet kullanarak tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quinto desafio usando apenas a força militar.

description.english: Finish the fifth trial with no combat
description.german: Fünfte Prüfung ohne Militäreinsatz bestehen
description.french: Finir la cinquième épreuve sans livrer bataille
description.italian: Finisci la quinta prova senza combattere
description.schinese: 不使用战斗来完成第五次试炼
description.russian: Завершите пятое испытание без единого сражения
description.turkish: Altıncı sınavı şiddet kullanmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o quinto desafio sem usar força militar.

description.english: Finish the sixth trial in any way
description.german: Sechste Prüfung beliebig bestehen
description.french: Finir la sixième épreuve d'une manière ou d'une autre

description.english: Finish the sixth trial with no reforms or oppression
description.german: Sechste Prüfung ohne Reformen oder Unterdrückung bestehen

description.russian: Завершите шестое испытание без реформ и притестений
description.turkish: Altıncı sınavı iyileştirmeden ve bastırmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o sexto desafio sem o uso de reformas ou opressão.

description.english: Finish the sixth trial in 10 turns or less
description.german: Sechste Prüfung in 10 oder weniger Runden bestehen
description.french: Finir la sixième épreuve en moins de 10 tours

description.russian: Завершите шестое испытание за 10 или менее ходов
description.turkish: Altıncı sınavı on tur içinde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o sexto desafio em 10 turnos ou menos.

description.english: Finish the seventh trial in any way
description.german: Siebte Prüfung beliebig bestehen
description.french: Finir la septième épreuve d'une manière ou d'une autre

description.turkish: Yedinci sınavı herhangi bir şekilde tamamla.

description.german: Siebte Prüfung ohne Hilfe des Schutzgottes bestehen
description.french: Finir la septième épreuve sans l'aide du dieu protecteur

description.turkish: Yedinci sınavı koruyucu tanrının yardımı olmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o sétimo desafio sem a ajuda de seu deus patrono.

description.english: Finish the seventh trial in 1 turn
description.german: Siebte Prüfung in 1 Runde bestehen
description.french: Finir la septième épreuve en 1 tour
description.italian: Finisci la settima prova in un turno

description.russian: Завершите седьмое испытание за 1 ход
description.turkish: Yedinci sınavı tek tur içinde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o sétimo desafio em um turno.

description.english: Finish the eighth trial in any way
description.german: Achte Prüfung beliebig bestehen
description.french: Finir la huitième épreuve d'une manière ou d'une autre
description.italian: Finisci l'ottava prova in qualsiasi maniera

description.russian: Завершите восьмое испытание любым способом
description.turkish: Sekizinci sınavı herhangi bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o oitavo desafio de uma maneira ou outra.

description.english: Finish the eighth trial without help from the patron god
description.german: Achte Prüfung ohne Hilfe des Schutzgottes bestehen
description.french: Finir la huitième épreuve sans l'aide du dieu protecteur
description.italian: Finisci l'ottava prova senza aiuti dal tuo dio patrono
description.schinese: 不受守护神的帮助下完成第八次试炼
description.russian: Завершите восьмое испытание, не используя помощь бога-покровителя
description.turkish: Sekizinci sınavı koruyucu tanrının yardımı olmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o oitavo desafio sem a ajuda de seu deus patrono.

description.english: Finish the eighth trial by performing a miracle
description.german: Achte Prüfung durch Wirken eines Wunders bestehen
description.french: Finir la huitième épreuve en faisant un miracle
description.italian: Finisci l'ottava prova facendo un miracolo
description.schinese: 通过召唤神迹来完成第八次试炼
description.russian: Завершите восьмое испытание, сотворив чудо
description.turkish: Sekizinci sınavı mucize gerçekleştirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o oitavo desafio fazendo um milagre.

description.english: Finish 'New settlement' quest without recruiting workers
description.german: Aufgabe 'Neue Siedlung' erledigen, ohne Arbeiter zu erschaffen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Nouvelle colonie' sans recruter de travailleurs
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Nuovi Insediamenti' senza reclutare lavoratori
description.schinese: 在没有招募工人情况下完成“新的定居点”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Новое поселение', не нанимая рабочих
description.turkish: 'Yeni Yerleşke' görevini işçi oluşturmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'Novo colono' sem nunca recrutar trabalhadores.

description.english: Finish 'Assimilation of neighbors' quest before turn 50 without subjugation or patronizing
description.german: Aufgabe 'Integration der Nachbarn' vor Runde 50 ohne Unterwerfung oder Patronat erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Assimilation des voisins' avant le 50ème tour sans soumettre ni assujettir
description.italian: Completa la missione 'Integrazione dei popoli vicini' prima del turno 50 senza soggiogare o patrocinare
description.schinese: 50回合之内，在没有征服与保护的情况下完成“同化邻居”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Ассимиляция с соседями', не применяя подчинение и покровительство до 50 хода
description.turkish: 'Komşuların Özümsenmesi' görevini boyun eğdirmeden ve himayeye almadan ellinci turdan önce tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'Integração dos nossos vizinhos' antes de turno 50 sem nada patrocínio nem subjugação.

description.english: Finish 'Ascension of the tribe' quest by building a temple in 3 turns
description.german: Aufgabe 'Aufstieg des Stammes' durch Bau eines Tempels in 3 Runden erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Ascension de la tribu' en construisant un temple en 3 tours
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Ascesa della Tribù' costruendo un tempio in 3 turni
description.schinese: 通过在3个回合内建造一座神庙来完成“发展部落”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Возвышение племени', построив храм в первые три хода после появления задания
description.turkish: 'Kavmin Yükselişi' görevini üç tur içinde tapınak yaparak tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'A Fundação do Mênfis' construindo um Templo em 3 turnos ou menos.

description.english: Finish 'Creation of the chiefdom' quest without annexation
description.german: Aufgabe 'Schaffung eines Stammesfürstentums' ohne Annexion erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Création d'une chefferie' sans annexion
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Nascita del dominio tribale' senza annessioni
description.schinese: 在进行吞并之前完成“建立酋邦”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Создание вождества', не применяя аннексию
description.turkish: 'Şefliğin Oluşturulması' görevini fethetmeden tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'Criação da chefatura' sem anexar ninguém.

description.english: Finish 'Creation of the chiefdom' quest before Narmer attacks
description.german: Aufgabe 'Schaffung eines Stammesfürstentums' erledigen, bevor Narmer angreift
description.french: Finir la quête 'Création d'une chefferie' avant l'attaque de Narmer
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Nascita del dominio tribale' prima dell'attacco di Narmer
description.schinese: 在那尔迈进攻前完成“建立酋邦”的任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Создание вождества' до атаки Нармера
description.turkish: 'Şefliğin Oluşturulması' görevini Narmer saldırmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'Criação da chefatura' antes de Narmer atacar você.

description.english: Finish 'Relocation of the capital' quest by finishing the construction of a palace and a temple at the same time
description.german: Aufgabe 'Umzug der Hauptstadt' durch gleichzeitige Fertigstellung eines Palasts und eines Tempels erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Transfert de la capitale' en ayant construit un palais et un temple en même temps
description.italian: Completa la missione 'Trasferimento della capitale' finendo la costruzione di un palazzo e di un tempio allo stesso tempo
description.schinese: 通过同时完成宫殿和神庙的建造来完成“迁都”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Перенос столицы', завершив одновременно строительство дворца и храма
description.turkish: 'Başkent Değişikliği' görevini saray ve tapınak yapımını aynı anda bitirerek tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'Mudança da capital' realizando a construção simultânea dum Palácio e um Templo simultaneamente.

description.english: Finish 'Stone of Memphis' quest before turn 115
description.german: Aufgabe 'Stein von Memphis' vor Runde 115 erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Pierre de Memphis' avant le 100ème tour
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Pietra di Memfi' prima del turno 100
description.schinese: 在100回合之前完成“孟菲斯之石”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Ресурсы Мемфиса' до 115 хода
description.turkish: 'Memfis Taşı' görevini yüzüncü turdan önce tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'A conquista do reino de Set' antes de turno 100.

description.english: Finish 'The Copper of the Sinai' quest before the start of the fifth trial
description.german: Aufgabe 'Sinai-Kupfer' vor dem Beginn der fünften Prüfung erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Cuivre du Sinaï' avec le début de la cinquième épreuve
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Il Rame del Sinai' prima dell'inizio della quinta prova
description.schinese: 在第五次试炼开始之前完成“西奈红铜”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Медь Синая' до начала пятого испытания
description.turkish: 'Sina Bakırı' görevini beşinci sınav başlamadan önce tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'O cobre do Sinai' antes do início do quinto desafio.

description.english: Finish 'Conquest of Lower Nubia' quest peacefully
description.german: Aufgabe 'Eroberung Unternubiens' friedlich erledigen
description.french: Finir pacifiquement la quête 'Conquête de la Basse Nubie'
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Conquista della Bassa Nubia' pacificamente
description.schinese: 和平完成“征服下努比亚”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Завоевание Нижней Нубии', присоединив всех мирно
description.turkish: 'Aşağı Nubiya'nın Fethi' görevini barışçıl bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'A conquista da Baixa Núbia' sem usar força militar.

description.english: Finish 'Conquest of Lower Nubia' quest within 5 turn from the end of 'The Copper of the Sinai' quest
description.german: Aufgabe 'Eroberung Unternubiens' innerhalb von 5 Runden nach Ende der Aufgabe 'Sinai-Kupfer' erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Conquête de la Basse Nubie' en moins de 5 tours après la fin de la quête 'Cuivre du Sinaï'
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Conquista della Bassa Nubia' entro 5 turni dalla fine della missione 'Il Rame del Sinai'
description.schinese: 在“西奈红铜”任务结束后的五个回合之内完成“征服下努比亚”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Завоевание Нижней Нубии' в течение 5 ходов после завершения задания 'Медь Синая'
description.turkish: 'Aşağı Nubiya'nın Fethi' görevini 'Sina Bakırı' görevi tamamlandıktan sonraki beş tur içinde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'A conquista da Baixa Núbia' em 5 turnos ou menos após a conclusão da missão 'O cobre do Sinai'.

description.english: Finish 'Conquering the kingdom of Seth' quest before turn 230 with Horus as a patron god
description.german: Aufgabe 'Eroberung von Seths Königreich' vor Runde 230 mit Horus als Schutzgott erledigen
description.french: Finir la quête 'Conquête du royaume de Seth' avec le 230ème tour avec Horus comme dieu protecteur
description.italian: Finisci la missione 'Conquista del regno di Seth' prima del turno 230 con Horus come dio patrono
description.schinese: 以荷鲁斯作为守护神并在230回合之前完成“征服赛特的王国”任务
description.russian: Выполните задание 'Объединение царства Cета' до 230 хода, играя за бога Хора
description.turkish: 'Set'in Krallığının Fethi' görevini Horus koruyucu tanrı iken iki yüz otuzuncu turdan önce tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete a missão 'A conquista do reino de Set' antes de turno 230 enquanto Horus é seu deus patrono.

description.english: Give no correct answers on a quiz
description.german: Keine richtigen Antworten in einem Quiz geben
description.french: Aucune réponse correcte au quiz
description.italian: Non dare risposte corrette in un quiz
description.schinese: 测验的问题全部回答错误
description.russian: Не дайте ни одного правильного ответа в экзаменах
description.turkish: Sınavda hiçbir soruya doğru yanıt verme.
description.brazilian: Responda todas as perguntas incorretamente no quiz.

description.english: Give 5 out of 10 correct answers on a quiz
description.german: 5 von 10 richtigen Antworten in einem Quiz geben
description.french: 5 réponses correctes sur 10 au quiz
description.italian: Dai 5 risposte corrette su 10 in un quiz
description.schinese: 测验的10个问题中正确回答5次
description.russian: Ответить правильно на 5 из 10 вопросов в экзаменах
description.turkish: Sınavdaki on sorunun beşine doğru yanıt ver.
description.brazilian: Responda 5 perguntas corretamente no quiz.

description.english: Give 10 out of 10 correct answers on a quiz
description.german: 10 von 10 richtigen Antworten in einem Quiz geben
description.french: 10 réponses correctes sur 10 au quiz
description.italian: Dai 10 risposte corrette su 10 in un quiz
description.schinese: 测验的10个问题全部回答正确
description.russian: Ответить правильно 10 из 10 вопросов в экзаменах
description.turkish: Sınavdaki on sorunun tamamına doğru yanıt ver.
description.brazilian: Responda todas as perguntas corretamente no quiz.

description.english: Build a pyramid during the second dynasty
description.german: Eine Pyramide in der II. Dynastie bauen
description.french: Construire une pyramide au cours de la deuxième dynastie
description.italian: Costruisci una piramide durante la seconda dinastia
description.schinese: 在第二王朝时期建造一座金字塔
description.russian: Построить любую пирамиду во время второй династии
description.turkish: İkinci hanedan döneminde bir piramit yap.
description.brazilian: Construa uma pirâmide enquanto a II Dinastia ainda reina.

description.english: Finish constructing the project of Khasekhemwy during the second dynasty
description.german: Das Projekt des Chasechemui in der II. Dynastie fertigstellen
description.french: Finir la construction du projet de Khâsekhemoui au cours de la deuxième dynastie
description.italian: Finisci di costruire il progetto di Khasekhemwy durante la seconda dinastia
description.schinese: 在第二王朝时期完成卡塞海姆威工程的建设
description.russian: Завершить строительство сооружения Хасехемуи во время второй династии
description.turkish: Hasekemi'nin projesini ikinci hanedan döneminde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Completa a construção do projeto de Khasekhemui enquanto a II Dinastia ainda reina.

description.english: Sacrifice 4 workers while constructing a single tomb
description.german: 4 Arbeiter beim Bau eines Grabs opfern
description.french: Sacrifier 4 travailleurs pour construire un seul tombeau
description.italian: Sacrifica 4 lavoratori mentre stai costruendo una singola tomba
description.schinese: 建造一座陵墓时牺牲4名工人
description.russian: Пожертвовать 4 рабочих на ускорение одной гробницы
description.turkish: Tek bir gömütü yaparken dört işçi feda et.
description.brazilian: Sacrifique 4 trabalhadores enquanto você está construindo uma única tumba.

description.english: Build a temple on every hill in Memphis
description.german: Tempel auf allen Anhöhen in Memphis bauen
description.french: Construire un temple sur chaque colline de Memphis
description.italian: Costruisci un tempio su ogni collina di Memfi
description.schinese: 在孟菲斯的每一座山上建造神庙
description.russian: Застроить все холмы в Мемфисе храмами
description.turkish: Memfis'teki her tepeye bir tapınak yap.
description.brazilian: Construa um Templo em cada colina no Mênfis.

description.english: Finish constructing a pyramid with all settings maxed
description.german: Eine Pyramide mit maximalen Merkmalen fertigstellen
description.french: Achever la construction d'une pyramide avec tous les réglages au maximum
description.italian: Finisci la costruzione di una piramide con tutte le opzioni al massimo
description.schinese: 以最高标准完成金字塔的建设
description.russian: Завершить строительство пирамиды с максимальными настройками в конструкторе пирамид
description.turkish: Tüm seçeneklerin doruk noktasında olduğu bir piramit yap.
description.brazilian: Construa uma tumba com todas as configurações dela definidas para o máximo!

description.english: Finish constructing a pyramid with all settings on the minimum
description.german: Eine Pyramide mit minimalen Merkmalen fertigstellen
description.french: Achever la construction d'une pyramide avec tous les réglages au minimum
description.italian: Finisci la costruzione di una piramide con tutte le opzioni al minimo
description.schinese: 以最低标准完成金字塔的建设
description.russian: Завершить строительство пирамиды с минимальными настройками в конструкторе пирамид
description.turkish: Tüm seçeneklerin dip noktasında olduğu bir piramit yap.
description.brazilian: Construa uma tumba com todas as configurações dela definidas para o mínimo.

description.english: Make all fourth dynasty tombs colossal and out of red granite
description.german: Alle Gräber der IV. Dynastie kolossal und mit rotem Granit errichten
description.french: Construire tous les tombeaux de la quatrième dynastie de taille colossale et en granit rouge
description.italian: Crea tutte e quattro le tombe della dinastia colossali e di granito rosso
description.schinese: 让第四王朝的所有陵墓都雄伟壮观且为红色花岗岩所筑
description.russian: Построить все гробницы четвертой династии в виде колоссальных мастаб из гранита
description.turkish: Tüm dördüncü hanedan gömütlerini devasa ve kızıl granitten olacak şekilde yap.
description.brazilian: Construa todas as Tumbas da IV Dinastia como estruturas colossais de granito vermelho.

description.english: Finish the game without losing a single battle
description.german: Spiel ohne militärische Niederlagen abschließen
description.french: Finir le jeu sans perdre une seule bataille
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza perdere una singola battaglia
description.schinese: 不输一场战斗通关游戏
description.russian: Не проиграть не одной битвы за полное прохождение
description.turkish: Oyunu hiçbir savaşı kaybetmeden tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem perder nenhuma batalha.

displayName.italian: Amico di tutto ciò che è vivo

description.english: Finish the game without killing animals
description.german: Spiel abschließen, ohne Tiere zu töten
description.french: Finir le jeu sans tuer d'animaux
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza uccidere animali
description.schinese: 不杀动物通关游戏
description.russian: За всю игру не убить не одного животного
description.turkish: Oyunu hayvan öldürmeden tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem matar nenhum animal.

description.english: Have lions, crocodiles, hippos, hyenas, antelopes, aurochs, wildfowl and fish tamed in Memphis at the end of the game
description.german: Spiel abschließen mit gezähmten Löwen, Krokodilen, Nilpferden, Hyänen, Antilopen, Auerochsen, Wildgeflügel und Fischen in Memphis
description.french: Avoir apprivoisé des lions, crocodiles, hippopotames, hyènes, antilopes, aurochs, oiseaux sauvages et poissons à Memphis avant la fin du jeu
description.italian: Doma leoni, coccodrilli, ippopotami, iene, antilopi, uri, selvaggina e pesci a Memfi entro la fine del gioco
description.schinese: 在游戏结束时，在孟菲斯拥有被驯服的狮子、鳄鱼、河马、鬣狗、羚羊、原牛、野禽和鱼
description.russian: К концу игры иметь в Мемфисе прирученными: львов, крокодилов, бегемотов, гиен, антилоп, туров, дичь, рыб
description.turkish: Oyunu Memfis'te aslan, timsah, su aygırı, antilop, tur öküzü, av kuşu ve balık evcilleştirmiş bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Domestique e pegue leões, crocodilos, hipopótamos, hienas, antílopes, auroques, galinhas selvagens e peixes no Mênfis ao final do jogo.

description.english: Perform 20 successful hunts in a single playthrough
description.german: Auf 20 erfolgreiche Jagden in einem Durchlauf gehen
description.french: Réussir 20 expéditions de chasse en une seule partie
description.italian: Effettua 20 battute di caccia con successo in una singola sessione di gioco
description.schinese: 在一次通关流程中成功狩猎20次
description.russian: За одну игру успешно провести охоту на 20 животных
description.turkish: Tek bir oynanışta yirmi avı başarıyla tamamla.
description.brazilian: Realize 20 caças com sucesso em uma única jogada.

description.english: Finish the game without having more than 50 workers
description.german: Spiel mit maximal 50 Arbeitern abschließen
description.french: Finir le jeu avec moins de 50 travailleurs
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza avere più di 50 lavoratori
description.schinese: 工人数量不超过50人通关游戏
description.russian: Завершите игру, не превышая лимит 50 рабочих
description.turkish: Oyunu elliden fazla işçiye sahip olmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem ter mais de 50 trabalhadores.

description.english: Finish the game with a worker limit at 100
description.german: Spiel mit Arbeiterlimit 100 abschließen
description.french: Finir la partie avec une limite de 100 travailleurs
description.italian: Finisci il gioco con il limite di lavoratori a 100
description.schinese: 工人数量上限100通关游戏
description.russian: Завершите игру, подняв максимальный лимит рабочих до 100
description.turkish: Oyunu işçi sınırını yüze çıkartmış bir şekilde tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo tendo um limite de trabalhadores de 100.

description.english: Finish the game without help from the patron god
description.german: Spiel ohne Hilfe des Schutzgottes abschließen
description.french: Finir le jeu sans l'aide du dieu protecteur
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza aiuti dal tuo dio patrono
description.schinese: 不受守护神帮助而通关游戏
description.russian: Завершите игру, не используя силу бога-покровителя
description.turkish: Oyunu koruyucu tanrının yardımı olmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem a ajuda do seu deus patrono.

description.english: Finish the game without worshipping gods even once
description.german: Spiel abschließen, ohne jemals Götter anzubeten
description.french: Finir le jeu sans adorer les dieux ne serait-ce qu'une fois
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza venerare un dio nemmeno una volta
description.schinese: 一次都不祭拜神明通关游戏
description.russian: Завершите игру, ни разу не почтив ни один культ
description.turkish: Oyunu tanrılara bir kez bile tapmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem nunca adorar um deus.

description.english: Finish the game without constructing graveyards, tombs or pyramids
description.german: Spiel abschließen, ohne Friedhöfe, Gräber oder Pyramiden zu bauen
description.french: Finir le jeu sans construire de cimetière, tombeau ou pyramide
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza costruire cimiteri, tombe o piramidi
description.schinese: 不建造墓地、陵墓或金字塔通关游戏
description.russian: Завершите игру, не построив ни одного клабдища, гробницы или пирамиды
description.turkish: Oyunu gömütlük, gömüt ya da piramit yapmadan tamamla.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem construindo nem Cemitérios nem tumbas.

description.english: Discover 'Step Pyramids' technology before Imhotep is born
description.german: Technologie 'Stufenpyramiden' vor der Geburt Imhoteps entdecken
description.french: Découvrir la technique 'Pyramide à degrés' avant la naissance d'Imhotep
description.italian: Scopri la tecnologia 'Piramidi a gradoni' prima che nasca Imhotep
description.schinese: 在印何阗出生前已探索“阶梯金字塔”
description.russian: Изучите технологию 'ступенчатых пирамид' до рождения Имхотепа
description.turkish: 'Adım Piramitleri' teknolojisini İmhotep doğmadan önce keşfet.
description.brazilian: Descubra a tecnologia 'Pirâmide de degraus' antes de Imhotep nascer.

description.english: Discover all technologies in the game
description.german: Alle Technologien im Spiel entdecken
description.french: Découvrir toutes les techniques au cours de la partie
description.italian: Scopri tutte le tecnologie disponibili
description.schinese: 探索游戏中所有技术
description.russian: Изучитие все доступные технологии в игре
description.turkish: Tüm teknolojileri keşfet.
description.brazilian: Descubra todas as tecnologias na campanha.

description.english: Complete 'Bandit network' event on the next turn after it appears
description.german: Ereignis 'Banditennetzwerk' nach Auftauchen in der nächsten Runde abschließen

description.italian: Completa l'evento 'Rete Criminale' il turno dopo essere comparso
description.schinese: 在“土匪组织”出现的下一回合即完成该事件
description.russian: Завершите событие 'Сеть бандитов' на следующий ход после его появления
description.turkish: 'Haydut Ağı' gelişmesini ortaya çıkmasından sonraki tur tamamla.
description.brazilian: Resolva o evento '''Rede de bandidos' no próximo turno depois que ele aparecer.

description.english: Find the RIver God in the Nile and start worshipping him
description.german: Flussgott im Nil finden und ihn anbeten
description.french: Trouver le dieu du Nil et commencer à l'adorer
description.italian: Trova il Dio del Fiume nel Nilo ed inizia a venerarlo
description.schinese: 找到尼罗河的河神并开始祭拜他
description.russian: Найдите в реке Нил речного бога и начните его почитать
description.turkish: Nil'deki Irmak Tanrısı'nı bul ve tapın.
description.brazilian: Encontre o Deus do Rio e adore-o.

description.english: Rob a caravan with Seth as a patron god
description.german: Eine Karawane mit Seth als Schutzgott ausrauben
description.french: Piller une caravane avec Seth comme dieu protecteur
description.italian: Rapina una carovana avendo Seth come dio patrono
description.schinese: 在赛特神的守护下劫掠一次商队
description.russian: Играя за бога-покровителя Сета, ограбить прибывший в ваши земли караван
description.turkish: Set koruyucu tanrı iken bir kervan soy.
description.brazilian: Roubar uma caravana tendo Set para seu deus patrono.

description.english: Arrange a marriage between Horus and a wealthy princess
description.german: Heirat zwischen dem Horus und einer wohlhabenden Prinzessin vermitteln
description.french: Arranger un mariage entre Horus et une riche princesse
description.italian: Organizza un matrimonio fra Horus e una ricca principessa
description.schinese: 安排一场荷鲁斯和富家公主的联姻
description.russian: Устройте брак Хора с богатой принцессой
description.turkish: Horus'u varlıklı bir prenses ile evlendir.
description.brazilian: Organize um casamento entre Hórus e uma rica princesa

description.english: Enter a war against a tribe living outside Nile valley and make it surrender
description.german: Krieg gegen ein Volk außerhalb des Niltals führen und es zur Kapitulation zwingen
description.french: Entrer en guerre contre une tribu vivant hors de la vallée du Nil et provoquer sa reddition
description.italian: Entra in guerra contro una tribù che vive fuori dalla valle del Nilo e falli arrendere
description.schinese: 与尼罗河流域外的部落交战，使其投降
description.russian: Примите войну с племенем вне поймы Нила и заставьте племя капитулировать
description.turkish: Nil vadisinin dışında yaşayan bir kavme savaş aç ve teslim olmalarını sağla.
description.brazilian: Faça a guerra contra uma tribo que vivia fora do Vale do Nilo e torná-lo a render-se.

description.english: Prevent a flood by reducing its chance to 0
description.german: Überflutung durch Senken ihrer Wahrscheinlichkeit auf 0 verhindern
description.french: Empêcher une inondation en atteignant le risque 0
description.italian: Impedisci un allagamento riducendo le probabilità a 0
description.schinese: 将水灾的几率降低至0以防止水灾
description.russian: Предотвратите наводнение, снизив его вероятность до 0%
description.turkish: Gerçekleşme olasılığını sıfıra indirerek bir selin gerçekleşmesini engelle.
description.brazilian: Evite uma inundação reduzindo a probabilidade de sua ocorrência até 0.

description.english: Stop an epidemic that engulfed 3 or more areas, before it stops naturally
description.german: Eine Epidemie stoppen, die sich auf 3 oder mehr Gebiete ausgebreitet hat, bevor sie natürlich abklingt
description.french: Stopper une épidémie ayant englouti plus de 3 zones, avant son extinction naturelle
description.italian: Ferma un'epidemia che ha inglobato 3 o più aree, prima che si fermi naturalmente
description.schinese: 在影响3个或更多地区的瘟疫自然消失之前遏制它
description.russian: Победите эпидемию до её окончания, когда она уже захватит 3 или более района
description.turkish: Üç ya da daha fazla bölgeye yayılan bir salgını kendiliğinden sonlanmadan önce durdur.
description.brazilian: Pare uma epidemia que infectou 3 ou mais áreas antes que ela desapareça sozinha.

description.english: During a 'Royal festival' event, outrun a bull while the success chance is 50% or lower
description.german: Beim Ereignis 'Königliches Fest' einen Bullen im Wettrennen besiegen bei Erfolgschance von maximal 50%
description.french: Durant l'événement 'Festival royal', semer un taureau avec une chance de réussite inférieure à 50%
description.italian: Durante un evento 'Festa Regale', supera nella corsa un toro quando le tue possibilità di successo sono del 50% o inferiori
description.schinese: 在“王室庆典”事件中，当成功几率小于等于50%时逃脱公牛的追赶
description.russian: Во время события 'Царский юбилей' победите быка с шансом не более 50%
description.turkish: 'Kraliyet Şöleni' gelişmesi sırasında, gerçekleşme olasılığı yüzden ellinin altındayken boğadan hızlı koş.
description.brazilian: Ultrapasse o jovem touro durante o aniversário real com suas chances de sucesso em 50% ou menos.

description.english: Raise your relations with the Bull tribe to 100
description.german: Beziehungen mit dem Bullen-Stamm auf 100 verbessern
description.french: Maximiser vos relations (100) avec la tribu du Taureau
description.italian: Migliora la tua relazione con la Tribù del Toro facendola arrivare a 100
description.schinese: 提升与公牛部落的关系至100
description.russian: Поднимите отношения с племенем быка на 100%
description.turkish: Boğa Kavmi ile ilişki durumunu yüze çıkar.
description.brazilian: Eleve seu relacionamento com a tribo do Touro até o nível máximo.

description.english: Annex Lebanon
description.german: Den Libanon annektieren
description.french: Annexer le Liban
description.italian: Libano Annesso
description.schinese: 征服黎巴嫩
description.russian: Аннексируйте Ливан
description.turkish: Lübnan'ı fethet.
description.brazilian: Anexe a região de Amu.

description.english: Explore entire map of Egypt
description.german: Gesamte Karte Ägyptens erkunden
description.french: Explorer toute la carte d’Égypte
description.italian: Esplora l'intera mappa d'Egitto
description.schinese: 探索完埃及的全部地图
description.russian: Разведайте всю территорию на карте Египта
description.turkish: Mısır haritasının tamamını keşfet.
description.brazilian: Explore o mapa inteiro do Egito.

description.english: Discover Germany during travels
description.german: Auf Reisen Deutschland entdecken
description.french: Découvrir la région de l'actuelle Allemagne au cours de vos voyages
description.italian: Scopri la Germania durante i viaggi
description.schinese: 在旅行中探索到德国的存在
description.russian: Откройте Германию во время путешествий
description.turkish: Yolculuk sırasında Almanya'yı keşfet.
description.brazilian: Descubra a Alemão durante seus viagens.

description.english: Have more than 10 tribes subjugated at once on the Egypt map
description.german: Zugleich mehr als 10 unterworfene Völker auf der Karte Ägyptens haben
description.french: Plus de 10 tribus soumises en même temps sur la carte d’Égypte
description.italian: Fai in modo da avere 10 tribù soggiogate in una volta nella mappa d'Egitto
description.schinese: 在埃及地图上一次性征服超过10个以上的部落
description.russian: Держите в подчинении на карте Египта более 10 племен одновременно
description.turkish: Mısır haritası üzerinde aynı anda ondan fazla boyun eğdirilmiş kavme sahip ol.
description.brazilian: Controle 10 povos subjugados simultaneamente no mapa do Egito.

description.english: Reach luxury growth of 50 using trade
description.german: Durch Handel das Wachstum von Luxuswaren auf 50 steigern
description.french: Atteindre 50 de croissance de produits de luxe par le commerce
description.italian: Raggiungi una produzione di gioielli di 50 utilizzando il commercio
description.schinese: 通过贸易达到每回合50单位的奢侈品增长
description.russian: Доведите прирост роскоши до 50 или более с помощью торговли за 1 ход
description.turkish: Ticareti kullanarak lüks artışını yüze çıkar.
description.brazilian: Receba 50 Luxos usando o comércio em um turno.

displayName.brazilian: 'Suave é o aroma dos teus ungüentos'

description.english: Send an expedition for incense
description.german: Expedition für Weihrauch entsenden
description.french: Envoyer une expédition chercher de l'encens
description.italian: Manda una spedizione di Incenso
description.schinese: 派遣探险队收集熏香
description.russian: Отправьте экспедицию за благовониями
description.turkish: Tütsü için keşif seferi gönder.
description.brazilian: Mande uma expedição para coletar o incenso.

description.english: Complete expeditions to 10 different location on the Egypt map in a single playthrough
description.german: Expeditionen zu 10 verschiedenen Orten auf der Karte Ägyptens in einem Durchlauf abschließen
description.french: Mener des expéditions vers 10 régions différentes de la carte d’Égypte en une seule partie
description.italian: Completa spedizioni verso 10 luoghi differenti nella mappa d'Egitto in una singola sessione di gioco
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中，完成对埃及地图上的10个不同地点的探险行动
description.russian: Совершите 10 экспедиций в разные места в течение одной игры на карте Египта
description.turkish: Tek oynanışta Mısır haritası üzerinde ondan farklı yere keşif seferi düzenle.
description.brazilian: Mande 10 expedições com sucesso para diferentes regiões do mapa da região numa jogada única.

description.english: Tame a carnivore
description.german: Fleischfresser zähmen
description.french: Apprivoiser un carnivore
description.italian: Doma un carnivoro
description.schinese: 驯服一只肉食动物
description.russian: Приручите хищное животное
description.turkish: Etobur bir hayvanı evcilleştir.
description.brazilian: Domestique um carnívoro.

description.english: Domesticate 3 animal species in a single area
description.german: 3 verschiedene Tierarten in einem Gebiet zähmen
description.french: Domestiquer 3 espèces d'animaux dans une seule région
description.italian: Addomestica 3 razze di animali in una singola area
description.schinese: 在一个地区内驯养3种动物
description.russian: Одомашните в одном районе 3 вида животных
description.turkish: Tek bir bölgede üç hayvan türünü evcilleştir.
description.brazilian: Domestique 3 espécies animais numa única área.

description.english: Win a battle with a balance of power of 35% or less
description.german: Eine Schlacht gewinnen, in der eigene Truppen maximal 35% aller Truppen sind
description.french: Remporter une bataille avec moins de 35% des forces en présence
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia con un bilancio di potere del 35% o meno
description.schinese: 以35%或者更少的战力比例赢得战斗
description.russian: Одержите победу в бою с балансом сил 35% в свою пользу или меньше
description.turkish: Güç dengesinin lehine yüzde otuz beş ya da daha altında olduğu bir savaşı kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha com um equilíbrio de poder de 35% ou menos.
